snippet: State lawmakers and transit advocates continued to urge the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to restore $1 billion in funding for the East Harlem leg of the Second Avenue subway.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio calls on Metropolitan Transportation Authority to reconsider decision to postpone construction of East Harlem portion of Second Avenue subway, adding his voice to chorus of criticism from state lawmakers and transit advocates.
lead_paragraph: State lawmakers and transit advocates continued to urge the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to restore $1 billion in funding for the East Harlem leg of the Second Avenue subway.

headline.main: Mayor de Blasio Joins in Criticism of 2nd Avenue Subway Cuts
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Joins in Criticism of 2nd Avenue Subway Cuts
